db:abstract.db:para: The AccelBubble example demonstrates the Accelerometer QML type.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = accelbubble QT += quick sensors svg xml SOURCES = main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ accelbubble.qrc
OTHER_FILES = \ $$files(*.qml) \ content \ images \ android/AndroidManifest.xml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/sensors/accelbubble INSTALLS += target
ios { QMAKE_INFO_PLIST = Info.plist
# manual plugin loading needed with older Qt # QTPLUGIN += qsvg qtsensors_ios qtsensors_generic }
ANDROID_PACKAGE_SOURCE_DIR = $$PWD/android
EXAMPLE_FILES += \ Info.plist
